review_data.title: Old beer in old botles
review_data.content: We orderd from the drink list to belgium beers. Both bottles were past theire expiration dates. One was 2018! Horrible! The waiter was nice but overwhelmed with the situation.

review_data.title: Great service and atmosphere

review_data.title: Great spot
review_data.content: Ok I'm from Portugal and being in Zurich served by a Portuguese guy it's great and a party moment. So the spot it's great and staff it's amazing. Nice to have a Portuguese beer!

review_data.title: Great atmosphere and memorable evening
review_data.content: We had an amazing evening, long and interesting conversations, tasty drinks, and we laughed so much! Just met our second family:)

review_data.title: Speakeasy Beers paradise in Zürich
review_data.content: Out of nowhere in a hidden corner we found the best beers selection place in the heart of Zürich. All the Trappists with original glasses served which beats every other beers place in Zürich. Great experience We will be back

review_data.title: Expensive Bar
review_data.content: We popped in as it was raining & the Football was on but it's ridiculously expensive. Staff are friendly enough- laughing all the way to the Bank!

review_data.title: A pleasant stop for quality beer
review_data.content: Located in the heart of Old Town (Niederdorf) this little pub serves quality beer, specializing in Belgian ales. review_data.title: Great Place For Drinks and People Watching
review_data.content: Located in the Old Town, the Andorra Bar and Café is a great place for drinks and people watching especially if the weather is nice. Friendly staff and a very nice selection of beer including Chopfab beer.

review_data.title: Good drinks, good spot to people watch
review_data.content: Great selection of cocktails, craft beers, and a great spot to people watch. Went here for drinks before dinner and would definitely recommend.

review_data.title: Great beer choice

review_data.title: Classy bar
review_data.content: Lovely atmosphere and incredible cocktails. Extremely friendly staff and amazing ambiance. A must see in the old town.

review_data.title: Top

review_data.title: Great Bar.. a must visit

review_data.title: Great Cocktails and large Beer/Whisky/Rum/Gin selection
review_data.content: Great bar with proper drinks selection in the oldtown of Zurich. Prices are quite high but appropriate for the central location and quality of drinks. Unlike in many other bars, the barkeepers actually know what they're doing. Outside tables and screens broadcast sport events available

review_data.title: Amazing choises Amazing People Amazing Experience.

review_data.title: Best bar in Zurich hands down!

review_data.title: Zurich favourite for craft beer
review_data.content: Decent selection of beers (even though only like 7 on tap), good prices, nice atmosphere with usually good music and nice staff. And centrally located. Definitely worth a visit if you wanna sit down and relax with a glass of cold beer.

review_data.title: Great choice of beer, friendly staff
review_data.content: Well if you look for a wide choice of beers bot from switzerland and from around the world , thats a nice place to start. Quite pricy though but well..thats zurich i d say...

review_data.title: Great beer. Great owner
review_data.content: Best bar in Zurich. Best beer if you want great beer. Great variety and there isn't any fake beer. Owner is great.

review_data.title: Our favourite bar in Zurich! A lovely little find!

review_data.title: Horrible service

review_data.title: Plenty of beers, but dear

review_data.title: Nice spot
review_data.content: Great local beer on tap. Relaxing and eat modern atmosphere with great blues being played. Had a couple of beers and a snack - spicy veg samosas and they were awesome! I read somewhere that this is one of the older bars in old town....More

review_data.title: Great Bar and great service
review_data.content: Great Bar, great music, perfect service and friendliest staff. Although very busy it is very enjoyable and nobody is overlooked, staff is very attentive and takes care everybody is feeling great.

review_data.title: Phantastische Bierauswahl, aber teuer

review_data.title: Great Place, Great Beer Selection, Friendly Owner
review_data.content: I found this place by accident when in Zurich. The owner was quite welcoming and his establishment is a great place for a mellow time with some amazing beers. If visiting Zurich on MarketStadt, I would definitely make time for a stop over here.

review_data.title: Небольшой , уютный бар.

review_data.title: Great find! Laid back and friendly.
review_data.content: Stumbled upon this place when Walking through the town on a sleepy, rainy Sunday... Excellent beer menu and owner was super accommodating and let us try a few beers before we selected one of the local micro brews. It's a funky little place with tons...More

review_data.title: Pleasant atmosphere with good selection of drinks...
review_data.content: The Andorra bar is popular with locals of all ages and features a giant wooden propeller hanging from the ceiling. The bar features an above average selection of drinks and service is both swift and friendly. Highly recommended!

review_data.title: Beers!
review_data.content: Varied and good selection of local and international beers. Didn't try the food but it was a nice atmosphere and they show live sports also.

review_data.title: Normal bar, a good place to chill
review_data.content: Typical Zurich bar, a good selection of beer and ales. Place was rather empty when we went there. Not much to remember.

review_data.title: A Good Place to Chill
review_data.content: A good bar in the centre of the city that has an excellent selection of drinks and local craft ales. The place is modern as it seems to be recently refurbished but at the same time has retained a Cody bar feel. A good stop...More

review_data.title: Slow staff, ok ambience
review_data.content: This place used to be one of my stops on a weekends night out with my friends. They had good local beer, amazing ambiance and staff. Unfortunately the owner changed and now you have to wait often for 30min to one hour for your order....More

review_data.title: Great selection of craft beers

review_data.title: Good selection of beer.
review_data.content: Sitting outdoor on the street in Niederdorf it is a good atmosphere. Good selection of beers, both on bottle and tap.

review_data.title: Sangria is the bomb here!
review_data.content: Great beer selection. Really cool bar. Decor is great too. A tad pricey but so is everything else here.

review_data.title: Quite a cosmopolitan Bar
review_data.content: Cosmopolitan as Pakistani owned and right opposite a Spanish Wine bar!!!. Really only a drinker's bar as food menu is limited. However a good range of beers on offer and some not seen elsewhere in Zurich. Very friendly owner(s) and reasonable prices too for Switzerland....More

review_data.title: Крафтовое пиво в центре Цюриха
review_data.content: Довольно приличный выбор пива различных стран, сортов, пивоварен, что не часто встречается на центральных улицах городов.

review_data.title: Good selection of beers
review_data.content: Nice atmosphere, outdoor (stree) seating, good service and good selection of beers from artigianal to commercial. Recommended.

review_data.title: Classy bar, great owner/host

review_data.title: Craft Beer
review_data.content: Another great place for craft beer lovers. Lots of options from local brewers, good service and interesting location. Deserves more than one visit!

review_data.title: Great place for drinks

review_data.title: Awesome bartender, Selena and some good beer

review_data.title: Great beer selection with very friendly staff.

review_data.title: American's in search of craft beer and tap water.

review_data.title: Great Bar
review_data.content: Friendly, charming service, nice bar! They do have Chopfab beer which I do recommend! I did exclude an additional waiting time for a beer... with their charming smile it will be forgiven. :-)

review_data.title: Great bar with an amazing beer selection

review_data.title: Great beer selection
review_data.content: Only found out about this place recently , but found they do have a great selection of beers, albeit a bit pricey. Certainly woth a visit if you like e decent beer and not the usual Swiss lagers

review_data.title: Everything I want in a bar

review_data.title: Worth every bit of it

review_data.title: PERFECT
review_data.content: Good selection of Belgian staples and Local micros, and enough TVs to see the World Cup What more could I want?

review_data.title: A great little bar
